affix_sense_info.affix_sense_chinese: 形容词后缀, 无实义

pos_mean_info_list.mean: 可认识的；可辨识的；可以审理的
可以认识到的；可辨识的
审理，审判管辖权；认知；标志

word_group.brief_definition: 认知发展；发展认知；认知的发育

bilingual.source: Undernutrition affects both physical and cognitive development.
bilingual.target: 营养不良影响身体和认知的发展。

bilingual.source: This is known as cognitive narrowing or cognitive tunnel vision.
Learning a second language has many cognitive benefits.
bilingual.target: 从认知的角度来说，学一门第二外语有很多益处。

bilingual.source: Patient knowledge, a cognitive factor, can also affect decision making.
bilingual.target: 病人的知识一个认知的因素也会影响决策。

bilingual.source: Conversion occurs where cognitive tensions manifest themselves in physical symptoms.
bilingual.target: 认知的紧张状态以体症的形式表现出来,就是变形发泄.

bilingual.source: Firstly, human facial cognitive models and rules are studied from the view of cognitive psychology.
bilingual.target: 首先从认知心理学角度研究了人脸认知的理论模型和人类识别人脸的规律.

bilingual.source: Construction Grammar is built on the grounding of Cognitive Linguistics and takes the cognitive approach.
bilingual.target: 构式语法基于认知语言学理论而建立，采用认知的方法研究语法。

bilingual.source: The function of cognitive science can explain the process of information.
bilingual.target: 认知的功能能够解释人的信息加工过程.

bilingual.source: The negative and cognitive symptoms are less dramatic but more pernicious.
bilingual.target: 至于负性及认知的症状就没那麽戏剧性,但更为恶毒.

bilingual.source: This is a classic case of visual simplicity leading to cognitive complexity.
bilingual.target: 一个经典的关系是视觉的简单会引起认知的负担.

yingyinNormal.zh: 这药能全面恢复认知力，我们准备好了。
yingyinNormal.videoNameEn: 《Rise of the Planet of the Apes》

yingyinNormal.zh: 只是单纯的认知失调，仅此而已。

yingyinNormal.en: You have no respect for cognitive reverie, you know that?
yingyinNormal.zh: 你知不知道，你对内心幻想一点都不尊敬。

yingyinNormal.en: Cognitive recalibration. I hit you really hard on the head.
yingyinNormal.zh: 重新校准意识，我狠敲了你的脑袋？

yingyinNormal.en: What is it? I think it's some kind of cognitive transmitter. You inject it like a serum.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这是什么我觉得是某种认知类递质，像血清一样注射到体内。

yingyinNormal.en: These include areas typically associated with social cognition, attention, and cognitive control.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这些区块基本上都和社会认知注意力以及认知控制有关。

yingyinNormal.en: Analysis. What motivated your attack on Clementine? A cognitive error triggered my Good Samaritan reflex.
yingyinNormal.zh: 分析模式，你攻击克莱门汀的动机是什么？一个认知错误触发了我的仁慈撒玛利亚人反射。

yingyinNormal.en: They lose their sensitivity to serotonin and norepinephrine. Which leads to? Impaired cognitive function.
yingyinNormal.zh: 会失去对5 羟色胺和正肾上腺素的敏感性。那就会引起？认知功能受损。

yingyinNormal.en: If you recognize when we make cognitive mistakes, when we fall short, we can actually think about how to improve the world.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你意识到你的认识什么时候会出错什么时候会达不到目标，我们就能够着手思考怎样来改善这个世界。

yingyinNormal.en: All righty. Some non-affect hesitation. Little cognitive D. And a fuck load of aggression, courtesy of those morons in narrative.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我来看看，有一些不影响运行的口吃，有点认知失调，存在大量的攻击性，用来应对故事线里那些白痴。

yingyinNormal.en: And if you disagree, I'd recommend you have a cat scan to look for a tumor pressing on the cognitive processing centers of your brain.
yingyinNormal.zh: 如果你不同意，我建议你去做一个X光断层扫描，看看是不是有肿瘤压迫到了你大脑的认知处理单元。

yingyinNormal.en: There's more. The applications go beyond the disease. There are indications that show that therapy can improve cognitive functioning, memory quality.
yingyinNormal.zh: 还有这种药物的作用已经不止于治病，有迹象表明该疗法能改善认知机能和记忆质量。
yingyinNormal.videoNameEn: 《Rise of the Planet of the Apes》

yingyinNormal.en: My colleagues and I are mapping the neurological substrates that subserve global information processing, which is required for all cognitive reasoning, including scientific inquiry, making my research ipso facto prior in the ordo cognoscendi.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我和同事们正在绘制神经基质，有利于促进全球信息处理，这种研究既要求认知推理也包括科学探索，由此事实可见，我的研究在认知序列上更高一层。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.en: connected with mental processes of understanding

examination_example.sentence: It turns out that the right mental workouts can significantly improve our basic <highlight>cognitive</highlight> functions.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 事实证明，恰当的脑力锻炼可以显著提高我们的基本认知功能。

examination_example.sentence: To filter out what is unique from what is shared might enable us to understand what guides complex cultural behavior in evolutionary or <highlight>cognitive</highlight> terms.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 从事物的共性过滤出特性，也许能让我们从进化或认知角度理解什么引导了复杂的文化行为的走向。

examination_example.sentence: The second identifies traits (particularly in word order) shared by many languages, which are considered to represent biases that result from <highlight>cognitive</highlight> constraints.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 第二次（努力）确定了许多语言共有的特征(尤其是按词序)，这些特征被认为代表了认知约束导致的偏见。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.en: connected with mental processes of understanding

examination_example.sentence: They lack the <highlight>cognitive</highlight> and memory skills.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他们缺乏认知和记忆技能。

examination_example.sentence: Studies have found obesity is associated with impairments in <highlight>cognitive</highlight> functioning.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 研究发现，肥胖与认知功能障碍有关。

examination_example.sentence: There is also a growing body of evidence that diet-induced <highlight>cognitive</highlight> impairments can emerge rapidly—within weeks or even days.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 越来越多的证据表明，饮食导致的认知障碍会在几周甚至几天内迅速出现。

examination_example.sentence: Robots capable of social engagement help with loneliness as well as <highlight>cognitive</highlight> functioning.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 能够参与社交的机器人有助于缓解孤独感，提高认知功能。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全四级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.en: connected with mental processes of understanding

examination_example.sentence: According to the first research to tackle this topic head-on, misnaming the most familiar people in our life is a common <highlight>cognitive</highlight> (认知的) error that has to do with how our memories classify and store familiar names.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 根据第一项针对该主题的研究，把生活中最熟悉的人名叫错是一种常见的认知错误，这与我们的记忆如何对熟悉的名字进行分类和储存有关。

examination_example.sentence: The study looked at computer-assisted <highlight>cognitive</highlight> (认知的) behavioral therapy (CBT) and found that it was no more effective in treating depression than the usual care patients receive from a primary care doctor.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 对计算机辅助认知行为疗法研究后发现，与主治医生提供的常规护理相比，该疗法在治疗抑郁症方面效果并不显著。

examination_example.sentence: The best defense against memory loss is to try to prevent it by building up your brain's <highlight>cognitive</highlight> (认知的) reserve.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 防止记忆力减退的最好办法是通过建立你大脑的认知储备来预防这种情况。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.en: connected with mental processes of understanding

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>Cognitive</highlight> Function May Decline As You Age.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 随着年龄的增长，认知功能可能会下降。

examination_example.sentence: And they tended to lose <highlight>cognitive</highlight> (认知) function at a much slower rate than those with the least mentally challenging jobs.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他们的认知功能丧失的速度往往比从事智力挑战最小的工作的人慢得多。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2018-2021年全国重点省市中考试卷，包括听力、阅读、完形、单选、填空、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.en: connected with mental processes of understanding

examination_example.sentence: The study suggests how such structural changes could bring about the beneficial effects of green spaces on <highlight>cognitive</highlight> development.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这项研究表明，这种结构变化如何带来绿色空间对认知发展的有益影响。

examination_example.sentence: Some of them are related to higher scores on <highlight>cognitive</highlight> tests.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 其中一些与认知测试中的高分有关。

examination_example.sentence: These differences are associated(关联) with beneficial effects on <highlight>cognitive</highlight> function (认知功能) .
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这些差异与对认知功能的有益影响有关。
